git_status.last_commit: 5d46d65 - Checkpoint: Epic 1.1 Milestone 3.1 - T041 Completed (7 minutes ago)

work_context.next_tasks: T043-T048 Dashboard components, Update analysis endpoint tests for new status format
work_context.notes: Implemented ResultAggregator service with multi-phase result aggregation, merging strategies (UNION, PREFER_RUNTIME, PREFER_STATIC, MERGE), validation logic, and statistical performance metrics aggregation. Integrated with AnalysisOrchestrator for comprehensive analysis result compilation. Created 33 result aggregator tests + 11 orchestrator tests (44 total passing). Supports 8 analysis result types with configurable aggregation strategies, dependency graph merging, architecture preference selection, and performance metric statistical analysis.

resume_instructions: Ensure you're in the project root: cd /workspace
Activate virtual environment if available: source .venv/bin/activate
Review modified files listed in this checkpoint
Review the work context for current tasks and blockers
Use GitHub Copilot with context from .github/copilot-instructions.md

project_goals: Demonstrate migration workflows from monoliths to microservices
Provide intelligent automation through agentic systems
Establish best practices for microservices decomposition
Enable practical implementation with real-world tools
copilot_context.current_phase: Initial phase focusing on development environment, Git workflow, tools structure, and reference codebase integration
